verses.name: Proverbs 1:8
verses.text: My son, hear the instruction of thy father, and forsake not the law of thy mother:

verses.name: Proverbs 1:9
verses.text: For they shall be an ornament of grace unto thy head, and chains about thy neck.

verses.name: Proverbs 1:10
verses.text: My son, if sinners entice thee, consent thou not.

verses.name: Proverbs 1:11
verses.text: If they say, Come with us, let us lay wait for blood, let us lurk privily for the innocent without cause:

verses.name: Proverbs 1:12
verses.text: Let us swallow them up alive as the grave; and whole, as those that go down into the pit:

verses.name: Proverbs 1:13
verses.text: We shall find all precious substance, we shall fill our houses with spoil:
